job_title: Executive Assistant to the President in Brimley, MI
pros: I worked for over thirteen years at Bay Mills Community College, and overall, it was a great place to work. I worked with a fantastic team, and the staff and faculty were very supportive of each other. The benefits were great, and there were many opportunities for advancement.
cons: For me, there were no cons.
